WARNING: Audio English / Language
for audio in english will need to download it separately in a mp3 file.
instructions to input audio in the film:


1 - copy or cut this file mp3 to movie folder
2 - open movie with media player classic
3 - click with right mouse button
4 - click in audio / track
5 - select file mp3 that was downloaded "Coraline 3D Dual www.FilmesCompletosOnlineHD.com.mp3"
Enjoy!



the audio file will be posted 1-3 days.
The download will be available here in the comments.
